nodes.name: fetchProject
_processPurchase
fetchProject
_processPurchase

buyTokens(address).details: low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE*** This function has a non-reentrancy guard, so it shouldn't be called by another `nonReentrant` function.

capReached().details: Checks whether the cap has been reached.

params._artist: Artist (Token) to be dispersed when a user contributes to crowdfund
params._cap: amount in wei that is crowdsale is trying to reach.
params._rate: How many token units a buyer gets per wei. The rate is the conversion between wei and the smallest and indivisible token unit. So, if you are using a rate of 1 with a ERC20Detailed token with 3 decimals called TOK 1 wei will give you 1 unit, or 0.001 TOK.
params._wallet: the address where funds are collected.

fetchProject().return: owner of Project.name of Project.imageHash of Project.description of Project.rate of Project.ownerWallet of Project.cap of Project.weiRaised of Project.capReached of Project.*

rate().return: the number of token units a buyer gets per wei.

wallet().return: the address where funds are collected.
